title: kSaNamaina ninu
sahitya:
kSaNamaina ninu vIDi mana jAlanE celi kSaNamaina nanu vIDi 
PObOkenAceli vinu vidhipainuNDi paDatrOyabOkE celi


caraNam 1    vanilOna andAla bhUpAla vIvulE manasAra muripincu muccaTala mATalE celiyA
    caraNam 2    aparanji milamilalu mirumiTlu golipelE pulakincelE mEnu gugurincele celiyA
